Institution Name: SULE LAMIDO UNIVERSITY, KAFIN HAUSA, JIGAWA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two ‘A’ level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
UTME Requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit  passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two relevant subjects.

For National Diploma holders, the other two relevant subjects could be from any     of Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject
